item.description:
This is from an email I received today from Brown Contra-

"Hi Folks,  I just wanted to pass along this message from the Brown University Folk Festival:

The Folk Musicians of Brown are hosting a FREE contra dance from 9 PM to midnight TONIGHT in Sayles Hall!  Contra dancing is a fun-filled traditional New England folk dance, featuring live music from the French Connection and calling by Paul Wilde.  It's great for beginners and advanced dancers alike!"

  

For more info on contra dancing, one can "google" or "youtube" it. It's a fun and social atmosphere. On street parking can usually be found on side streets. Bring water, you'll be thirsty. Dress in comfortable clothes and possibly hard soled shoes.
item.how_to_find_us: You can leave me your cell.
item.name: Contra Dance Tonight
